entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog at times this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
